author: jvanzyl
msg: Have to lazily initialize the distributionMap because when the distribution
is added to the project it is not yet complete, at least it appears not
to be. This allows us to lookup distributions by id for the dist target.

author: jvanzyl
msg: - Changing the dist back to the way it originally worked which is to
take a distid from the POM in order to get the <tag> required for
checkout out sources to use in a dist build. I think xo was broken
which might have been what prevented this from working.

author: jvanzyl
msg: Getting rid of the xo references, sorry about that.

author: kaz
msg: Redo-ing my changes regarding the <jar> element as we've now decided
that it is gone (permanently).  Also updated docs to reflect the <type>
element is also gone from the <dependency> element.
